const user_model_1 = require("../src/typeprm/entities/user.model");
const code_model_1 = require("../src/typeprm/entities/code.model");
const property_model_1 = require("../src/typeprm/entities/property.model");
const config_1 = require("@nestjs/config");
const ticket_model_1 = require("../src/typeprm/entities/ticket.model");
class TypeormConfig {
    static getOrmConfig(configService) {
        return {
            type: 'mysql',
            host: configService.get('DB_HOST'),
            port: configService.get('DB_PORT'),
            username: configService.get('DB_USERNAME'),
            password: configService.get('DB_PASSWORD'),
            database: configService.get('DB_NAME'),
            entities: [user_model_1.User, code_model_1.Code, property_model_1.Property, ticket_model_1.Ticket],
            synchronize: true,
        };
    }
}
exports.default = TypeormConfig;
exports.typeOrmConfigAsync = {
    imports: [config_1.ConfigModule],
    inject: [config_1.ConfigService],
    useFactory: async (configService) => TypeormConfig.getOrmConfig(configService),
};
